title: Ranked Lobby
body: I was just recently in a ranked lobby going through picks and bans like normal and all of a sudden a notification pops up on my screen saying that the lol client has stopped working and needs to be shut down. So having no other option I close the program and my duo partner tells me that the pick phase is still going. So I hurry and log in to try to get back to the lobby, however as I login I have no option to rejoin the lobby and I check my lp and promo series and surprise surprise I have one loss added to my promos I lost 3 lp and I got a 5 minute queue ban for something that happened to my client which its functionality is up to riot to maintain. All I want to know is riot working on a way to fix this. Maybe an error report system for instances like this or maybe a way to rejoin the lobby. I feel as if I have been very harshly penalized for something that is either A) riots fault or B) Windows fault.

replies.body:
It sounds like your client dropped its connection to the game platform service entirely, which caused the crash. I suggest taking a look at our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a list of steps that commonly resolve this type of issue.

Let me know if this resolved the issue for you.
